snippet: The persistence of a breed’s aficionados resulted in recognition by the American Kennel Club and a place at the Westminster Kennel Club’s show.
lead_paragraph: The persistence of a breed’s aficionados resulted in recognition by the American Kennel Club and a place at the Westminster Kennel Club’s show.

headline.main: At Long Last, Westminster Gives Rat Terriers a Chance to Show
headline.print_headline: At Long Last, Westminster Gives Rat Terriers a Chance to Show
